Introduction: Kiwi does not know you.#$b#Kiwi thinks you're new here.#$b#Do not follow Kiwi.$a

spring_23: Humans dance tomorrow. Kiwi likes watching forest dancing.$h

Tue10: Kiwi think you  good friend.#$e#Kiwi happy Kiwi meet you.
Wed10: Shee! Hup hup!$h#$e#Friend! Kiwi happy to see you.$4
